data.title: Lodha Crown Dombivali East Thane
data.meta_description: Lodha Crown Dombivli - 1 & 2 BHK flats/apartments for sale in Dombivali East-Manpada, Thane. Get price list, reviews, location, floor plan, address, booking, etc
data.text:
Lodha Crown Dombivli - 1 & 2 BHK Flats/Apartments for Sale in Dombivli East, Thane

Owning a house in the city of dreams is a wish everyone has. However, many times, such dreams are crushed by the soaring real estate prices in Mumbai.

In such a domain, if you still wish to check right owning a house from your bucket list, Lodha Group brings you a remarkable investment option in the Dombivli region of Mumbai.

With amazing pricing, centrally located property, and different configuration of available properties as per choice, Lodha Crown in Dombivli East is a perfect choice for investors looking to buy a residential property in Mumbai. A suburb that's beautifully developed and makes you feel at home, it promises to bring you closer to your loved ones.

Property Overview: An Introduction to Lodha Crown

A project from the experienced house of Lodha, Lodha Crown, located in Dombivali, Manpada, is a gorgeous-looking residential development in the heart of an emerging suburb of Mumbai. Lodha Crown Dombivli offers 1 and 2 BHK apartments that come at different prices for investors to choose from based on their budget. The homes here are a delight for investors, and Lodha Group's strong brand reputation makes sure that the construction does not have any scope for mediocrity.

What sets apart the property is its welcoming and loving homes that one can call their own along with a plethora of lavish amenities in the property. Being an investor or a resident here means a life of ease and peace.

Investments made here are secured and are backed by the guidelines set by RERA. Given that, Lodha Crown Dombivli's RERA number is P51700048779. The developments here are scheduled in two phases. Lodha Crown Dombivli launch and possessions date are December of 2022 and December of 2025, respectively.

Talking about Lodha Crown Dombivli's construction update and status, the project is currently under construction.

Why Invest in Lodha Crown?

No matter what you are looking for in your perfect house to incorporate into your lifestyle, Lodha Crown has everything in its kitty. The property is a great combination of tradition and modernity that works fine for families, bachelors, and even spinsters. Lodha Crown Dombivli 1 and 2 BHK prices completely justify the price at which they are available.

Here are some of the attractions that play an important role in making sure Lodha Crown works wonders:

Grand clubhouse including swimming pools, indoor games

Equipped with a Gymnasium, library, party lawn and community hall

Spacious kid's play area

Well-maintained landscape garden

Proximity to Lodha World School

Multi-tier security to ensure all-round safety for your loved ones

Medical facilities for health emergencies

Lodha Crown Location Advantage:Location is the most important factor in any real estate property. That is what determines if your property will receive high resale value in the future. Because Lodha Grown provides you with access to both a private residence with facilities and the outside world, it's the ideal location for you to purchase your dream house. Lodha Crown Dombivli's location lets you go to work or send your children to prestigious schools without worrying about the length of your commute. Location is the most important factor in any real estate property. That is what determines if your property will receive high resale value in the future.

Because Lodha Grown provides you with access to both a private residence with facilities and the outside world, it's the ideal location for you to purchase your dream house. Lodha Crown Dombivli's location lets you go to work or send your children to prestigious schools without worrying about the length of your commute. Here’s how the location of Lodha Crown looks from prime destinations:

3 minutes form Shiv Mandir & Pagda Pada bus stop

20 minutes from Narivali and Nilaje Railway station

5 minutes from AIMS Diagnosis Centre and Cintella Health

2 minutes from top Lodha schools

High street retail and shopping malls in 10 minutes

Investing in Lodha Crown Dombivli:

If the project caught your attention and you're wondering what Lodha Crown Dombivli's price list and reviews look like, you can request the brochure and get all the information. Lodha Crown Dombivli's brochure contains details like floor plan, address, contact number, and booking details.

The property is currently under c0nstruction and once the possession is made, your investment will get substantial resale value and produce high capital appreciation.

About Lodha Group:

Lodha Group is one of the most prominent names in the real estate sector of Maharashtra with expertise of over forty years. Over the years it has developed some of the most prestigious projects in India with excellence in both commercial and residential markets.

Their unique proposition lies in sincerity, professionalism and on time delivery of projects that encompasses scenic masterpieces. In recent times, Lodha Group has become a synonym to trust, quality, and architectural modernism.

*T&C Apply.
